root.name: Organ Trail
root.description: OverviewOrgan Trail is a browser game developed and published by The Men Who Wear Many Hats. Organ Trail is meant to simulate an edutainment game originally on the Apple II and is a parody of the game The Oregon Trail. Instead of simulating life on the aforementioned western trail, the player instead leads a group of survivors across a zombie infested United States.Organ Trail: Director's Cut, a Kickstarter-funded expansion of the game, was released in 2012 for iOS and, later, made available for Android, as well as Steam and Desura. This version has been declared by the creators as being a "standalone game."
